question: Which bank has has signed an agreement for information utility services with the National E-Governance Services Limited?
explanation: Indian Overseas Bank has entered into an agreement for information utility services with the National E-Governance Services Limited. With this agreement, the IOB branches will be able to provide high-quality, authenticated information about debts and defaults. The NeSL became India's first information utility for bankruptcy cases under the 'Insolvency & Bankruptcy Code 2016' in October 2017.
